means: 蒙罗维亚（利比里亚首都； 美国一城市）

sentence.Network_en: The rebels have opened the road from Monrovia to the Ivory Coast.
sentence.Network_cn: 叛乱分子已经开放了从蒙罗维亚到象牙海岸的道路。

sentence.Network_en: Monrovia after the fighting is eerily quiet.
sentence.Network_cn: 战斗过后的蒙罗维亚静得让人害怕。

sentence.Network_en: This latest attack was at Careysburg, twenty miles north-east of the capital, Monrovia.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近的这次袭击发生在首都蒙罗维亚东北20英里处的凯里斯堡。
